New Records: The Kansas City Royals advanced to the American League Divisional Series after sweeping the Baltimore Orioles in the AL Wild Card round
Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. legged out an infield single to drive home Kyle Isbel in the sixth inning
Royals bullpen allowed one hit and three strikeouts across the final 3 2/3 innings
MJ Melendez made a crucial catch with a 5% probability
Nick Massey saved a potential run with a diving catch
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals' defense and pitching performed exceptionally well
The team's victory was a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals will face the New York Yankees in the ALDS starting on October 5
The Royals held a 2-5 record against the Yankees this season
The Royals and Yankees have a historical rivalry with the Royals winning the last postseason meeting in 1980
